title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 731.1 - Quarterly report required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 731.1 - Quarterly report required

State Regulations

Every electric and/or gas corporation in classes A and B
shall file with the commission a quarterly report for the quarter ended March, June and September. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
731.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
